title: Even Distribution of Car Types
natural_language: Add a constraint ensuring that each car type is evenly distributed across the production sequence so that no long gaps occur between identical types.
expected_change: Introduce a new parameter 'gap_limit' and constraint requiring that for each car type t, every sliding window of length gap_limit contains at least one occurrence of t.
evaluation_goal: Verify that no window of size gap_limit in the sequence is entirely missing a car type.
